speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the debate on the report by Elmar Brok, on behalf of the Committee on Foreign Affairs, on the Commission’s 2007 enlargement strategy paper [ 2007/2271(INI) ] ( A6-0266/2008 ).
original: President. − The next item is the debate on the report by Elmar Brok, on behalf of the Committee on Foreign Affairs, on the Commission’s 2007 enlargement strategy paper [ 2007/2271(INI) ] ( A6-0266/2008 ).
